title: Jamie Foxx, 51, looks dapper and in high spirits as he attends screening for new film Just Mercy
text:
He recently split from his girlfriend Katie Holmes after a six-year romance.

And actor Jamie Foxx looked to be putting the past behind him as he attended a screening for new film Just Mercy in California on Wednesday with co-star Karen Kendrick, who plays his wife.

The 51-year-old appeared to be in high spirits as he was pictured in a black suit and polo neck alongside Kendrick, who wore a flowing green evening gown.

Looking dapper: Jamie Foxx looked to be putting the past behind him as he attended a screening for new film Just Mercy in California on Wednesday with co-star Karan Kendrick

Foxx's new film, which is based on a true story, sees the A-lister star as Walter McMillian, a man wrongly convicted of murder.

His character enlists the help of attorney Bryan Stevenson, played by co-star Michael B. Jordan, to appeal the miscarriage of justice.

Brie Larson also stars in the film as local criminal justice advocate Eva Ansley. Together she and Stevenson work to prove McMillian's innocence.

Grand entrance: The 51-year-old appeared to be in high spirits as he was pictured in a black suit and polo neck alongside on-screen wife Kendrick, who wore a flowing green evening gown

Django Unchained star Foxx's appearance comes after he partied up a storm in Hollywood last month in an event to raise money for Hurricane Dorian relief efforts.

He was pictured getting cosy with lots of ladies at the event, with Foxx appearing to be the main attraction.

The rapper has done his best to shoot down rumours that after his split from Holmes, 40, in May, he has found love again with muse Sela Vave.

The two have been pictured on quite a few nights out of late but Foxx took to Instagram to play down a romantic link.

Suave: Foxx's new film, which is based on a true story, sees the A-lister star as Walter McMillian, a man wrongly convicted of murder

Instead, the star has insisted that he is 'helping out' the musician as she tries to get her career off the ground.

He and Katie first went public with their long-term romance in 2017, though it is thought they had been together for four years previously.

Meanwhile, prior to their courtship, Katie was married to Tom Cruise, with whom she shares daughter Suri, 13.

In happier times: Katie and Jamie are thought to have split at the end of May (pictured together earlier that month)
